item.title: 据说联合信贷银行计划与 40 亿欧元德国贷款相关的 SRT 项目
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）正在进行一项重大的风险转移，该风险转移与一个近 40 亿欧元（42 亿美元）的德国企业贷款组合有关。【原文：UniCredit SpA is working on a significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of almost €4 billion ($4.2 billion) of German corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 破纪录的严寒将袭击美国中部地区，令得克萨斯州电网不堪重负
item.description: 本周，冬季风暴和破纪录的严寒将降临美国中部和南部地区，交通受阻，脆弱的德克萨斯州电网也将再次面临考验。【原文：Winter storms and record-breaking cold will descend on the central and southern US this week, snarling transportation and putting the fragile Texas power grid to yet another test.】

item.title: 富达资产达 5.9 万亿美元，收入跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 全球第三大资产管理公司富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）的基金资产在过去一年中增加了 1 万亿美元，收入也跃升至历史新高。【原文：Fidelity Investments, the world’s third-largest asset manager, saw assets in its funds rise by $1 trillion over the past year and revenue jump to a record high.】

item.title: 多米尼加共和国在债务回购中重返全球市场
item.description: 多米尼加共和国正在重返全球债务市场，测试投资者对新债券的胃口，因为该国提出回购部分未偿还债券。【原文：The Dominican Republic is returning to global debt markets, testing investor appetite for new bonds as it offers to buy back some of its outstanding notes.】

item.title: 先锋超越道富成为全球最大的 ETF 基金
item.description: 先锋（Vanguard）击败道富（State Street）成为全球最大的交易所交易基金，为这个价值 11 万亿美元的行业带来了新的世界秩序。【原文：Vanguard has unseated State Street for the title of the world’s biggest exchange-traded fund, ushering in a new world order for the $11 trillion industry.】

item.title: 卡森-布洛克关注印度基金，回避中国股市上涨
item.description: 做空者卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）正在前往印度，考虑成立一家专注于印度股票的基金，因为他不想加入中国市场的反弹。【原文：Short seller Carson Block is heading to India to look at starting a fund focusing on the country’s stocks, as he stays away from joining a rally in China’s market.】

item.title: 哈德逊河、琥珀加密量子老兵希望与索拉纳对决
item.description: 一对来自量化交易领域的资深人士创办了一家区块链初创公司，希望帮助其他加密货币项目复制 Solana 网络的成功。【原文：A pair of veterans from the quantitative trading world have launched a blockchain startup that wants to help other crypto projects seeking to replicate the success of the Solana network.】

item.title: 尼日利亚修订数字资产规则，对加密货币交易征税
item.description: 尼日利亚正在修订法规，允许对加密货币交易和数字化交易征税，以增加收入。【原文：Nigeria is amending regulations to allow cryptocurrency trading and digitized transactions to be taxed as it seeks to boost revenue.】

item.title: 月活用户突破 4500 万，WhatsApp 面临更严格的欧盟规定
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.的信息服务 WhatsApp 达到了一个关键的用户里程碑，很可能使其受到欧盟《数字服务法案》（Digital Services Act）更严格规则的约束。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s messaging service WhatsApp reached a crucial user milestone likely to bind it to more stringent rules under the European Union’s Digital Services Act.】

item.title: 美国与俄罗斯讨论乌克兰命运，泽连斯基被冷落
item.description: 在美国和俄罗斯官员讨论乌克兰未来之际，乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）正在四处寻找二手信息。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy is casting around for scraps of second-hand information as officials from the US and Russia discuss the future of his country.】

item.title: 加拿大通货膨胀率因能源价格上涨而升至 1.9
item.description: 加拿大消费者物价三个月来首次加速上涨，因为央行偏好的核心指标被证明具有粘性。【原文：Canadian consumer prices reaccelerated for the first time in three months as the central bank’s preferred core measures are proving sticky.】

item.title: 七国集团盟国考虑收紧俄罗斯石油价格上限以打击莫斯科
item.description: 随着乌克兰战争的持续，七国集团正在考虑集体收紧或调整对俄罗斯石油的价格上限，以减少莫斯科的收入。【原文：The Group of Seven is considering collectively tightening or adapting an oil price cap on Russian petroleum in an effort to reduce Moscow’s revenues as the war in Ukraine continues.】

item.title: 巴西今年首次出售债券，重返全球债务市场
item.description: 巴西正在利用国际信贷市场，在 2025 年初该国资产广泛反弹的背景下，六个多月来首次发行新债。【原文：Brazil is tapping international credit markets, offering new debt for the first time in more than six months amid a broad rally in the country’s assets early in 2025.】

item.title: 花旗扭转英国电信买入观点，预测 Openreach 收入下降
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）警告说，英国电信集团（BT Group Plc）最赚钱的业务收入可能会下降，这可能会拖累这家英国电信运营商的股价下跌约四分之一。【原文：BT Group Plc’s most profitable business is likely to see a drop in revenue that could drag shares of the British telecommunications operator lower by about a quarter, Citigroup Inc. warned.】

item.title: 优酷网红因业绩不佳、成本飙升而关闭 ETF
item.description: 一位广受欢迎的 YouTuber 正在关闭他的主动管理交易所交易基金，因为该基金的市场表现不佳，而且在竞争激烈的 ETF 行业经营成本高昂。【原文：A popular YouTuber is closing down his actively-managed exchange-traded fund after it underperformed the market and ran up against the costs of doing business in the competitive ETF industry.】

item.title: 左翼分子在哥伦比亚的失败引发狂热的大选押注股反弹
item.description: 对于哥伦比亚股市来说，今年的开局并不寻常。【原文：It’s been an unusual start to the year for Colombian stocks.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气繁荣掩盖了黯淡的现实
item.description:
过去一周的价格暴跌为这个充满考验的冬季的结束提供了缓解，但该地区的燃料平衡在一段时间内仍将紧张。【原文：

The past week’s price plunge is providing relief at the end of a testing winter, but the region’s fuel balance will remain tight for a while.

】

item.title: 欧盟否认向美国提出降低汽车关税的提议
item.description: 欧盟表示，在努力避免与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发生贸易对抗之际，欧盟尚未提出任何降低美国进口汽车关税的具体提议。【原文：The European Union said it hasn’t made any specific offer yet to reduce tariffs on imported US cars as it works to avoid a trade confrontation with President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 英国收益率攀升至 5%，债券交易员寻求八倍回报
item.description: 债券期权市场的一位交易员押注英国借贷成本将飙升至近二十年前全球金融危机以来的最高点。【原文：A trader in the bond options market is betting on UK borrowing costs surging to the highest since the global financial crisis almost two decades ago.】

item.title: 欧洲柴油市场发出供应压力警告
item.description: 由于燃料贸易商继续面临供应压力，欧洲基准柴油期货显示出市场供应紧张的迹象。【原文：Benchmark diesel futures are showing signs of market tightness in Europe, as fuel traders continue to face supply pressures.】

item.title: 污水泄漏、账单增加— 英国水危机解析
item.description: 在系统性污水泄漏和管道长期漏水丑闻的影响下，英国自来水行业正准备进行自 1989 年私有化以来最大规模的改革。经过数十年的投资不足，用户将通过有史以来最大的家庭和企业账单涨幅来承担解决问题的成本。【原文：Britain’s water industry is bracing for the biggest overhaul since privatization in 1989 amid a scandal over systematic sewage spills and chronic pipe leaks. After decades of underinvestment, it’s customers who will shoulder the cost of fixing the problems through the biggest ever bill increase for households and business.】

item.title: Norinchukin 首席执行官奥库计划在债券巨额亏损后辞职
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，日本 Norinchukin 银行首席执行官奥田和人（Kazuto Oku）计划辞职，以承担该银行因错误押注外国债券而造成巨额损失的责任。【原文：Norinchukin Bank Chief Executive Officer Kazuto Oku plans to resign to take responsibility for the Japanese lender’s large losses incurred due to wrong-way bets on foreign bonds, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国科技界和政界领袖展现团结风采
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，高渊将讲述中国公私科技合作中的重要一天。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Gao Yuan recounts a momentous day in China’s public-private tech endeavors.】

item.title: 世贸组织会议拉开帷幕，贸易 "动荡 "列入议程
item.description: 世界贸易组织自唐纳德-特朗普宣誓连任美国总统以来的首次总理事会会议于周二开始，并将持续到周三，闭门会议议程长达 15 个项目。【原文：The World Trade Organization’s first General Council meeting since Donald Trump was sworn in for a second term as US president gets underway Tuesday and will stretch into Wednesday with an agenda for the closed-door session that’s 15 items long.】

item.title: 婴儿配方奶粉供应链断裂时挺身而出的初创企业
item.description:
Bobbie 在网络父母中树立了崇拜者形象—一次发布一条 TikTok 消息和一罐有机奶粉。【原文：

Bobbie has built a cultlike following among online parents—one TikTok post and can of organic formula at a time.

】

item.title: 习近平的科技会议是中国经济的积极信号
item.description: 我是驻悉尼的国际经济编辑马尔科姆-斯科特。今天，我们将关注中国国家主席习近平与商界领袖的会晤及其对经济的意义。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at Chinese President Xi Jinping’s meeting with business leaders and what it signifies for the economy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 乌克兰谈判推低天然气期货，德国电价下滑
item.description: 由于天然气期货下跌，德国年前电力价格跌至 1 月初以来的最低点，凸显出德国比邻国更依赖天然气燃料。【原文：German year-ahead power prices slumped to their lowest since early January as gas futures dropped, underlining the country’s stronger reliance on the fuel than its neighbors.】

item.title: Diamondback 公司通过双鹰交易扩展二叠纪石油资产
item.description: Diamondback Energy Inc. 同意收购 Double Eagle IV Midco LLC 的部分子公司后，将扩大其在二叠纪盆地的石油资产。【原文：Diamondback Energy Inc. will expand its oil assets in the Permian Basin after agreeing to acquire some subsidiaries of Double Eagle IV Midco LLC, a significant asset boost for the top independent oil and gas producer in North America’s most prolific shale patch.】

item.title: 英国央行贝利称特朗普关税导致债券波动不受欢迎
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，他希望看到债券市场减少波动，他认为这在很大程度上是由于围绕美国关税发布的一系列公告造成的。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said he’d like to see less volatility in bond markets, much of which he puts down to a flurry of announcements around US tariffs.】

item.title: 英国就桑杰-沙的税务交易对第八家伦敦经纪商处以罚款
item.description: 英国当局完成了对 Cum-Ex 交易的第八次调查，对伦敦一家经纪公司处以 160 万英镑（200 万美元）的罚款，因为该公司参与执行了臭名昭著的税务交易，导致欧洲国库损失数十亿欧元。【原文：UK authorities completed their eighth investigation into Cum-Ex trades, fining a London brokerage firm £1.6 million ($2 million) for its involvement in executing the notorious tax deals that have cost European treasuries billions of euros.】
